scripts.docker:prune: docker container prune -f; docker image prune -f; docker network prune -f
scripts.docker:default:verify: docker exec mysql-default bash -c 'mysql -uroot -proot000 -e "show databases;" && echo "*** OK" || echo "!!! FAILED"'
scripts.docker:custom:verify: docker exec mysql-custom bash -c 'mysql -uroot -proot000 -e "show databases;" && echo "*** OK" || echo "!!! FAILED"'
